body: Search query: ExecutionStatus="Completed" AND StartTime > 1656703640000 tries to show all completed workflows where StartTime is in the future (of when this report was made) But the results still show workflows: It seems after clicking search, if the results of query are empty, the currnetly shown workflows in list are not updated (not removed) same query using tctl produces 0 results: [15:28:41] tsurdilovic:my-temporal-dockercompose git:(main*) $ tctl wf list -q ExecutionStatus="Completed" AND StartTime > 1656703640000 [15:28:46] tsurdilovic:my-temporal-dockercompose git:(main*) $
title: Advanced search and start time in the future
